naslov: PRODAJA - VILA S BAZENOM - POGLED NA MORE - PRIVLAKA (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: PRODAJA - VILA S BAZENOM - PRIVLAKA POGLED NA MORE! Prodajemo luksuznu vilu s bazenom u mirnom predjelu Privlake. Nalazi se svega 100m od mora s pogledom na more. Vila se sastoji od prizemlja i prvog kata te krovne terase. Prizemlje ukupne površine od 90,83m2 sastoji se od hodnika, kupaonice, kuhinje s blagovaonicom i dnevnim boravkom, spavaće soba, dijelom natkrivene terasa, ostave ispod stepenica i spremišta. Na prvom katu, ukupne površine od 77,77m2, nalaze se hodnik, dvije spavaće sobe, jedna spavaća soba s kupaonicom, još jedna kupaonica i dijelom natkrivena terasa. Unutarnje stepenice vode na krovnu terasu gdje je napravljena priprema za jacuzzi i djelomično postavljena ljetna kuhinja. Krovna terasa sa pripadajućim stubištem ima površinu od 85,85m2. Vila je kompletno namještena i uređena. Ukupna površina vile zajedno s bazenom iznosi 286,45m2. Bazen je površine 32m2. Izgrađena je na zemljištu površine 441m2, 2020.g. U dvorištu su 3 parkirna mjesta. Vila je građena ciglenim termo blokom. Termoizolacija fasade je izvedena s 10 cm stiropora. Podne obloge su pločice i laminat. Prozori su od PVC materijala s roletama i komarnicima. U kući je 5 klima uređaja. Po jedan uređaj je u svakoj sobi i dnevnom boravku. U kupaonicama, dnevnom boravku, kuhinji i blagovaonici je postavljeno podno grijanje. Ulazna vrata kuće su protuprovalna. Bazen ima pripremu za grijanje. Obloga bazena je folija. Kraj bazena je vanjski tuš. Na terasi je plinski roštilj. Travnjak ima navodnjavanje.Vlasništvo je uredno 1/1, bez tereta. Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar FOR SALE - VILLA WITH POOL - PRIVLAKA SEA VIEW! We are selling a luxurious villa with a pool in a quiet area of Privlaka. It is located only 100 meters from the sea with a beautiful sea view. The villa consists of a ground floor, first floor, and a rooftop terrace. The ground floor, with a total area of 90.83m², includes a hallway, bathroom, kitchen with dining room and living room, bedroom, partially covered terrace, storage under the stairs, and a utility room. The first floor, with a total area of 77.77m², includes a hallway, two bedrooms, one bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, another bathroom, and a partially covered terrace. Internal stairs lead to the rooftop terrace, where there is a setup for a jacuzzi and a partially installed summer kitchen. The rooftop terrace, along with the staircase, has an area of 85.85m². The villa is fully furnished and decorated. The total area of the villa, including the pool, is 286.45m². The pool area is 32m². The villa was built on a plot of land measuring 441m² in 2020. There are 3 parking spaces in the yard. The villa is built with brick thermal blocks. The thermal insulation of the facade is done with 10 cm of styrofoam. The flooring consists of tiles and laminate. The windows are made of PVC with shutters and mosquito nets. The villa is equipped with 5 air conditioning units. One unit is in each bedroom and the living room. The bathrooms, living room, kitchen, and dining room have underfloor heating. The entrance door of the house is burglar-proof. The pool has provisions for heating. The pool lining is foil. There is an outdoor shower at the pool. The terrace has a gas barbecue. The lawn has an irrigation system. The ownership is clean, 1/1. Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar
